title: PPP condemns Police attack on Islamabad Press Club: Marri
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 2 (APP):Central Spokesperson of Pakistan Peoples Party Parliamentarians (PPPP), Shazia Marri strongly condemned the police attack on Islamabad Press Club, terming it an unacceptable and regrettable act.
She said the vandalism carried out by police personnel in the cafeteria of the Press Club was highly condemnable. “The use of force against journalists inside the club is absolutely unacceptable,” she added.
Expressing solidarity with the journalist community, the PPP leader said her party stood shoulder to shoulder with media professionals. “Such incidents deserve the strongest condemnation. Action must be taken against those involved in this attack,” she demanded.
She urged that the reasons behind the police assault on the Press Club should be brought to light. “Pakistan Peoples Party fully expresses its solidarity with the journalist fraternity,” she reiterated.
